amendment.description: Amendment prohibits any funds under the Act from being used to reallocate Federal highway formula funding for the livable communities program unless the program is first authorized by Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part A of House Report 111-578 to prohibit any funds under the Act from being used to reallocate Federal highway formula funding for the livable communities program unless the program is first authorized by Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. DeFazio.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
